description:
Keep little feet comfy, protected and warm with these warm neoprene boots. The 5mm thick neoprene helps protect from rocks and sharp bits and is perfect for temperatures around 8 to 12˚C.

  • 5mm neoprene provides protection and comfort
  • Ankle zipper for easy on and off
  • Taitex outer seam for durability
  • Textured rubber sole is durable and grippy
name: Xcel Axis Neoprene Round Toe Zipper 5mm Boots - Children
